properties.name: SelfRegistration.Enable
properties.description: Allow user's to self register to the system.

properties.name: SelfRegistration.LockOnCreation
properties.description: Lock self registered user account until e-mail verification.

properties.name: SelfRegistration.Notification.InternallyManage
properties.description: Disable if the client application handles notification sending

properties.name: SelfRegistration.ReCaptcha
properties.description: Enable reCaptcha verification during self registration.

properties.name: SelfRegistration.VerificationCode.ExpiryTime
properties.displayName: User self registration verification link expiry time
properties.description: Specify the expiry time in minutes for the verification link.

properties.name: SelfRegistration.VerificationCode.SMSOTP.ExpiryTime
properties.displayName: User self registration SMS OTP expiry time
properties.description: Specify the expiry time in minutes for the SMS OTP.

properties.name: SelfRegistration.CallbackRegex
properties.displayName: User self registration callback URL regex
properties.description: This prefix will be used to validate the callback URL.

properties.name: _url_listPurposeSelfSignUp
properties.description: Click here to manage Self-Sign-Up purposes

properties.name: LiteRegistration.Enable
properties.description: Allow user's to self register to the system without a password.

properties.name: LiteRegistration.LockOnCreation
properties.description: Lock self registered user account until e-mail verification.

properties.name: LiteRegistration.Notification.InternallyManage
properties.description: Disable if the client application handles notification sending

properties.name: LiteRegistration.ReCaptcha
properties.description: Enable reCaptcha verification during self registration.

properties.name: LiteRegistration.VerificationCode.ExpiryTime
properties.displayName: Lite user registration verification link expiry time
properties.description: Specify the expiry time in minutes for the verification link.

properties.name: LiteRegistration.VerificationCode.SMSOTP.ExpiryTime
properties.displayName: Lite user registration SMS OTP expiry time
properties.description: Specify the expiry time in minutes for the SMS OTP.

properties.name: LiteRegistration.CallbackRegex
properties.displayName: Lite user registration callback URL regex
properties.description: This prefix will be used to validate the callback URL.

properties.name: _url_listPurposeLiteUserSignUp
properties.description: Click here to manage Lite-Sign-Up purposes

properties.name: EmailVerification.Enable
properties.description: A verification notification will be triggered during user creation.

properties.name: EmailVerification.LockOnCreation
properties.description: The user account will be locked during user creation.

properties.name: EmailVerification.Notification.InternallyManage
properties.description: Disable if the client application handles notification sending.

properties.name: EmailVerification.ExpiryTime
properties.description: Set the time span that the verification e-mail would be valid, in minutes. (For infinite validity period, set -1)

properties.name: EmailVerification.AskPassword.ExpiryTime
properties.description: Set the time span that the ask password e-mail would be valid, in minutes. (For infinite validity period, set -1)

properties.name: EmailVerification.AskPassword.PasswordGenerator
properties.description: Temporary password generation extension point in ask password feature.)

properties.name: _url_listPurposeJITProvisioning
properties.description: Click here to manage just in time provisioning purposes.
